text: Rock Against Communism (RAC) is a type of rock music. It started as a series of Neo-Nazi concerts in the United Kingdom in the late 1970s and 1980s. The first RAC concert was in Leeds, England in 1978. == RAC bands == *Skrewdriver *Bound For Glory *Skullhead *Landser *Mistreat *Blue Eyed Devils *Violent Storm ==Related pages== *Blood and Honour *British National Front == Other websites == *Blood and Honour
title: Rock Against Communism
